title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-2.4 - Generally accepted accounting principles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-2.4 - Generally accepted accounting principles

State Regulations

The completion of the financial and statistical report forms shall be in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles as applied to the residential health care facility unless the reporting instructions authorized specific variation in such principles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
